comment.body:
It looks like an extension issue (it happens even with all filter lists disabled), but it seems that it has been fixed in version 4.2 which is currently in beta.

As a workaround, you can add this rule:
```adblock
||login.betha.cloud/servicelogin/js/linkedinlogin.js
```
to user rules.
It should fixes this issue, but it will be not possible to login using LinkedIn account.

issue.title: oucoraphothed.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Annoyance) [https://oucoraphothed.com/click.php?key=0g61n1v0084b04xw9y0l&visitor_id=che9oprilrdamjg0hpig&zoneid=4697302&campaignid=6850456&type=Push&age=17&creative_id=265319&campaign_id=78492&site_id=3334&placement_id=11627753&user_activity=known&countryname=PT](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Foucoraphothed.com%2Fclick.php%3Fkey%3D0g61n1v0084b04xw9y0l%26visitor_id%3Dche9oprilrdamjg0hpig%26zoneid%3D4697302%26campaignid%3D6850456%26type%3DPush%26age%3D17%26creative_id%3D265319%26campaign_id%3D78492%26site_id%3D3334%26placement_id%3D11627753%26user_activity%3Dknown%26countryname%3DPT) ### Comment Username: @Oda-se > Em Notificações do MacBook Pro, há muitos dias que me surge na barra das notificações à direita, o aviso de que o comptador está ingectado, que a núvem está a ser violada, etc. Clicando abreo o Safari e surge a porcaria do site para accionar a defesa do computador. Já tentei de tudo e não consigo bloquear esta melguice de primeira apanha, que só me entope as notificações. > Queria também pedir a vossa ajuda para saber como posso eradicar completa e definitivamente os ficheiros da Kaspersky. Cometi o erro de uma vez experimentar e esse vírus chamado anti-vírus e ao serviço da espionagem russa nunca mais me largou. comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

Hi! In general, it's better to address this to Apple support if your MacBook has malware.
As I recall, `kavremover` can help to remove Kaspersky software, but it's only for Windows - better to ask their support. Perhaps they have an alternative solution for Mac.

> Obrigado e bom resto de semana.

Thank you and have a nice day!
